Function to create accreditation cards (8 per DIN-A4 page)

Source: R/accreditation.R
create_accreditation.Rd

Function to create accreditation cards (8 per DIN-A4 page)

Usage

create_accreditation(
  data = NULL,
  path = NULL,
  event = NULL,
  name.column = NULL,
  affiliation.column = NULL,
  lpic = NULL,
  rpic = NULL
)

Arguments

data

a data frame including names and affiliations (optional if affiliation.column is NULL) to create accreditation cards.

path

Folder path where the output will be printed

event

Title of the event

name.column

Column name of the data data frame which specifies the participant's name.

affiliation.column

Column name of the data data frame which specifies the participant's affiliation.

lpic

PNG object route. File route of the top-left image. Can be blank if set to NULL.

rpic

PNG object route. File route of the top-right image. Can be blank if set to NULL.

Value

An 'output' folder with the PDF documents inside

Author

Julia G. de Aledo, Ignacio Ramos-Gutierrez

Examples

if (FALSE) {
data <- read_sheet(url='https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d
        /16smXdP-Ehwu1cEmJTbJI1DerIpUrOcD7H5Ni6z9B07M/edit#gid=0')
create_accreditation(data=data,
path = "LabeleR_output",
event="INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE OF MUGGLEOLOGY",
name.column = "List",
affiliation.column="Affiliation",
lpic = NULL,
rpic = NULL)
}
